.. image:: /images/mgdbLogo.png
   
Installation
===============

This is a guide to halp you find out how to install MangrovesDB.
* Install on Ubuntu
* Install on Mac-Windows (To be added)

Please follow the next steps to install MGDb on your system.

* Binary form GitHub 
* Commands from here (Builds from source): 

mangrovesDB CLI installation,
sqlite SDK compatile library --->

   :caption: Prerequisites
   :hidden:
